document_data.name: Shan Khantayan
document_data.mainbody: '''Shan Khantayan''' was a chieftain in the [[Northern Wastes]] of [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Personality: Shan was not a very able leader but luckily had good counsel from [[Ayana No-Shui]], a fact that all his people knew and accepted. He was a very vain individual, especially susceptible to jewellery and flattery. Through these, he could be easily manipulated.
